00015 void *read_2D(std::string fname, std::string dsname,
00016               std::string type, hsize_t dims[])
00017 {
00018     auto file_id = H5Fopen(fname.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT);
00019     H5T_class_t class_id;
00020     size_t type_size;
00021     H5LTget_dataset_info(file_id, dsname.c_str(),
00022                          dims, &class_id, &type_size);
00023     std::transform(type.begin(), type.end(), type.begin(), ::tolower);
00024     void *res;
00025 
00026     if (type == "int" && sizeof(int) == type_size) {
00027         res = malloc(dims[0] * dims[1] * type_size);
00028         H5LTread_dataset_int(file_id, dsname.c_str(), (int *)res);
00029     } else if (type == "double" && sizeof(double) == type_size) {
00030         res = malloc(dims[0] * dims[1] * type_size);
00031         H5LTread_dataset_double(file_id, dsname.c_str(), (double *)res);
00032     } else if (type == "float" && sizeof(float) == type_size) {
00033         res = malloc(dims[0] * dims[1] * type_size);
00034         H5LTread_dataset_float(file_id, dsname.c_str(), (float *)res);
00035     } else {
00036         std::cerr << "[Monitors] Requested type not supported or not compatible\n"
00037                   << "with actual data type size\n";
00038     }
00039     return res;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void *read_1D(std::string fname, std::string dsname,
00043               std::string type, hsize_t dims[])
00044 {
00045     auto file_id = H5Fopen(fname.c_str(), H5F_ACC_RDONLY, H5P_DEFAULT);
00046     H5T_class_t class_id;
00047     size_t type_size;
00048     H5LTget_dataset_info(file_id, dsname.c_str(),
00049                          dims, &class_id, &type_size);
00050     std::transform(type.begin(), type.end(), type.begin(), ::tolower);
00051     void *res;
00052 
00053     if (type == "int" && sizeof(int) == type_size) {
00054         res = malloc(dims[0] * type_size);
00055         H5LTread_dataset_int(file_id, dsname.c_str(), (int *)res);
00056     } else if (type == "double" && sizeof(double) == type_size) {
00057         res = malloc(dims[0] * type_size);
00058         H5LTread_dataset_double(file_id, dsname.c_str(), (double *)res);
00059     } else if (type == "float" && sizeof(float) == type_size) {
00060         res = malloc(dims[0] * type_size);
00061         H5LTread_dataset_float(file_id, dsname.c_str(), (float *)res);
00062     } else {
00063         std::cerr << "[Monitors] Requested type not supported or not compatible\n"
00064                   << "with actual data type size\n";
00065     }
00066     return res;
00067 }

00069 SlicesMonitor::SlicesMonitor(std::string filename, int n_turns, Slices *slices)
00070 {
00071     fFileName = filename;
00072     fNTurns = n_turns;
00073     fSlices = slices;
00074     fITurn = 0;
00075     fFile = new H5File(fFileName, H5F_ACC_TRUNC);
00076     fGroup = new Group(fFile->createGroup("Slices"));
00077 }
00078 
00079 SlicesMonitor::~SlicesMonitor()
00080 {
00081     delete fFile;
00082     delete fGroup;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void SlicesMonitor::track()
00086 {
00087     if (fITurn == 0)
00088         create_data({fSlices->n_slices, (uint) fNTurns});
00089     write_data();
00090     fITurn++;
00091 }
00092 
00093 
00094 void SlicesMonitor::write_data()
00095 {
00096     auto dataset = fGroup->openDataSet("n_macroparticles");
00097     hsize_t offset[2], count[2], stride[2], block[2];
00098     const uint size = fSlices->n_macroparticles.size();
00099     count[0] = size;
00100     count[1] = 1;
00101     offset[0] = 0;
00102     offset[1] = fITurn;
00103     stride[0] = stride[1] = 1;
00104     block[0] = block[1] = 1;
00105     DataSpace memspace(2, count, NULL);
00106     auto dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00107     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00108 
00109     auto temp = new int[size][1];
00110     for (uint i = 0; i < size; i++)
00111         temp[i][0] = fSlices->n_macroparticles[i];
00112 
00113     dataset.write(temp, PredType::NATIVE_INT, memspace, dataspace);
00114     delete[] temp;
00115 
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 void SlicesMonitor::create_data(const uint_vector_t dims)
00120 {
00121     hsize_t dim[2], chunk[2];
00122     dim[0] = dims[0];
00123     dim[1] = dims[1];
00124     chunk[0] = dims[0];
00125     chunk[1] = 1;
00126     DataSpace dataspace(2, dim);
00127     DSetCreatPropList plist;
00128     plist.setChunk(2, chunk);
00129     plist.setDeflate(9);
00130     auto dset = DataSet(fGroup->createDataSet("n_macroparticles",
00131                         PredType::NATIVE_INT,
00132                         dataspace, plist));
00133 }

00136 void SlicesMonitor::close()
00137 {
00138     fGroup->close();
00139     fFile->close();
00140 }

00144 
00145 BunchMonitor::BunchMonitor(GeneralParameters *GP, RfParameters *RfP, Beams *Beam,
00146                            std::string filename, int buffer_time,
00147                            Slices *Slices, PhaseLoop *PL, LHCNoiseFB *noiseFB)
00148 {
00149     fFileName = filename;
00150     fNTurns = GP->n_turns;
00151     fITurn = 0;
00152     fBufferTime = buffer_time == 0 ? fNTurns : buffer_time;
00153     fRfP = RfP;
00154     fBeam = Beam;
00155     fSlices = Slices;
00156     fNoiseFB = noiseFB;
00157     fPL = PL;
00158     fH5File = new H5File(fFileName, H5F_ACC_TRUNC);
00159     fH5Group = new Group(fH5File->createGroup("Beam"));
00160 
00161     if (fSlices != NULL && fSlices->fit_option == fit_type::gaussian_fit)
00162         fGaussian = true;
00163     else
00164         fGaussian = false;
00165 
00166     init_data(fNTurns + 1);
00167     init_buffer();
00168     track();
00169 }
00170 
00171 
00172 BunchMonitor::~BunchMonitor()
00173 {
00174     close();
00175 }
00176 
00177 
00178 void BunchMonitor::track()
00179 {
00180     fBeam->statistics();
00181     if (fITurn <= fNTurns)
00182         write_buffer();
00183     fITurn++;
00184     if (fITurn > 0 && fITurn % fBufferTime == 0) {
00185         write_data();
00186         // init_buffer();
00187     }
00188 }

00191 void BunchMonitor::init_data(int dimension)
00192 {
00193     int_vector_t intV;
00194     f_vector_t doubleV;
00195     hsize_t dim[1], chunk[1];
00196     dim[0] = dimension;
00197     chunk[0] = dimension / 10;
00198 
00199     DataSpace dataspace(1, dim);
00200     DSetCreatPropList plist;
00201     plist.setChunk(1, chunk);
00202     plist.setDeflate(9);
00203 
00204     fBeam->statistics();
00205 
00206 
00207     auto dataset = fH5Group->createDataSet("n_macroparticles_alive",
00208                                            PredType::NATIVE_INT,
00209                                            dataspace, plist);
00210     intV.resize(dimension, 0);
00211     intV[0] = fBeam->n_macroparticles_alive();
00212     dataset.write(intV.data(), PredType::NATIVE_INT);
00213 
00214 
00215     dataset = fH5Group->createDataSet("mean_dt",
00216                                       PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00217                                       dataspace, plist);
00218     doubleV.resize(dimension, 0);
00219     doubleV[0] = fBeam->mean_dt;
00220     dataset.write(doubleV.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE);
00221

00224                                       PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00225                                       dataspace, plist);

00227     dataset.write(doubleV.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE);
00228 
00229 
00230 
00231     dataset = fH5Group->createDataSet("sigma_dt",
00232                                       PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00233                                       dataspace, plist);
00234     doubleV[0] = fBeam->sigma_dt;
00235     dataset.write(doubleV.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE);
00236

00254                                           PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00255                                           dataspace, plist);
00256         doubleV[0] = fSlices->bl_gauss;

00263                                           PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00264                                           dataspace, plist);

00313     if (fNoiseFB != NULL) {

00315                                           PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,

00323                                           dataspace, plist);
00324         doubleV[0] = fNoiseFB->fBlMeas;
00325         dataset.write(doubleV.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE);
00326 
00327         if (!fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB.empty()) {
00328             hsize_t dim[2], chunk[2];
00329             dim[1] = fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB.size();
00330             dim[0] = dimension;
00331             chunk[0] = dimension / 10;
00332             chunk[1] = 1;
00333 
00334             DataSpace dataspace(2, dim);
00335             DSetCreatPropList plist;
00336             plist.setChunk(2, chunk);
00337             plist.setDeflate(9);
00338 
00339             dataset = fH5Group->createDataSet("LHC_noise_FB_bl_bbb",
00340                                               PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00341                                               dataspace, plist);
00342             doubleV = fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB;
00343             dataset.write(doubleV.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE);
00344         }
00345     }
00346

00350 void BunchMonitor::write_data()
00351 {
00352     // const int rank = dims.size();
00353     hsize_t offset[1], count[1], stride[1], block[1];
00354     count[0] = fBufferTime;
00355     offset[0] = fITurn - fBufferTime;
00356     stride[0] = 1;
00357     block[0] = 1;
00358     DataSpace memspace(1, count, NULL);
00359     // std::cout << fITurn << "\n";
00360     auto dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("n_macroparticles_alive");
00361     auto dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00362     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00363     dataset.write(b_np_alive.data(), PredType::NATIVE_INT,
00364                   memspace, dataspace);
00365 
00366 
00367     dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("mean_dt");
00368     dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00369     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00370     dataset.write(b_mean_dt.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00371                   memspace, dataspace);
00372 
00373 
00374     dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("mean_dE");
00375     dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00376     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00377     dataset.write(b_mean_dE.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00378                   memspace, dataspace);
00379 
00380 
00381     dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("sigma_dt");
00382     dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00383     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00384     dataset.write(b_sigma_dt.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00385                   memspace, dataspace);
00386 
00387 
00388     dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("sigma_dE");
00389     dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00390     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00391     dataset.write(b_sigma_dE.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00392                   memspace, dataspace);
00393 
00394 
00395     dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("epsn_rms_l");
00396     dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00397     dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00398     dataset.write(b_epsn_rms.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00399                   memspace, dataspace);
00400 
00401     if (fGaussian) {
00402         dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("bunch_length_gaussian");
00403         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00404         dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00405         dataset.write(b_bl_gauss.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00406                       memspace, dataspace);
00407 
00408     }
00409 
00410     if (fPL != NULL) {
00411         dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("PL_omegaRF");
00412         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00413         dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00414         dataset.write(b_PL_omegaRF.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00415                       memspace, dataspace);
00416

00418         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00419         dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00420         dataset.write(b_PL_phiRF.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00421                       memspace, dataspace);
00422

00424         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();

00427                       memspace, dataspace);
00428

00430         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();

00433                       memspace, dataspace);

00438         dataset.write(b_PL_omegaRF_corr.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00439                       memspace, dataspace);
00440 
00441 
00442         dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("SL_dphiRF");
00443         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();

00454

00456         dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("LHC_noise_FB_factor");
00457         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00458         dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00459         dataset.write(b_LHCnoiseFB_factor.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00460                       memspace, dataspace);
00461 
00462 
00463         dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("LHC_noise_FB_bl");
00464         dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00465         dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00466         dataset.write(b_LHCnoiseFB_bl.data(), PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00467                       memspace, dataspace);
00468 
00469 
00470         // TODO: Particularly test this part
00471         if (!fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB.empty()) {
00472 
00473             hsize_t offset[2], count[2], stride[2], block[2];
00474             const uint size = fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB.size();
00475             count[0] = 1;
00476             count[1] = size;
00477             offset[0] = fITurn;
00478             offset[1] = 0;
00479             stride[0] = stride[1] = 1;
00480             block[0] = block[1] = 1;
00481 
00482             DataSpace memspace(2, count, NULL);
00483 
00484             auto temp = new double[fBufferTime * size];
00485             for (int i = 0; i < fBufferTime; i++)
00486                 for (uint j = 0; j < size; j++)
00487                     temp[i * size + j] = b_LHCnoiseFB_bl_bbb[i][j];
00488 
00489 
00490             dataset = fH5Group->openDataSet("LHC_noise_FB_bl_bbb");
00491             dataspace = dataset.getSpace();
00492             dataspace.selectHyperslab(H5S_SELECT_SET, count, offset, stride, block);
00493             dataset.write(temp, PredType::NATIVE_DOUBLE,
00494                           memspace, dataspace);
00495 
00496             delete[] temp;
00497         }
00498 
00499     }
00500 
00501 }

00503 
00504 // void BunchMonitor::open(){}
00505 void BunchMonitor::init_buffer()
00506 {
00507     b_np_alive.resize(fBufferTime);
00508     b_mean_dt.resize(fBufferTime);
00509     b_mean_dE.resize(fBufferTime);
00510     b_sigma_dt.resize(fBufferTime);
00511     b_sigma_dE.resize(fBufferTime);
00512     b_epsn_rms.resize(fBufferTime);
00513 
00514     if (fGaussian)
00515         b_bl_gauss.resize(fBufferTime);
00516 
00517     if (fPL != NULL) {
00518         b_PL_omegaRF.resize(fBufferTime);
00519         b_PL_phiRF.resize(fBufferTime);
00520         b_PL_bunch_phase.resize(fBufferTime);
00521         b_PL_phase_corr.resize(fBufferTime);
00522         b_PL_omegaRF_corr.resize(fBufferTime);
00523         b_SL_dphiRF.resize(fBufferTime);
00524         b_RL_drho.resize(fBufferTime);
00525     }
00526     if (fNoiseFB != NULL) {
00527         b_LHCnoiseFB_factor.resize(fBufferTime);
00528         b_LHCnoiseFB_bl.resize(fBufferTime);
00529         if (!fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB.empty())
00530             b_LHCnoiseFB_bl_bbb.resize(fBufferTime);
00531     }
00532 
00533 }
00534 
00535 
00536 void BunchMonitor::write_buffer()
00537 {
00538 
00539     int i = fITurn % fBufferTime;
00540 
00541     b_np_alive[i] = fBeam->n_macroparticles_alive();
00542     b_mean_dt[i] = fBeam->mean_dt;
00543     b_mean_dE[i] = fBeam->mean_dE;
00544     b_sigma_dt[i] = fBeam->sigma_dt;
00545     b_sigma_dE[i] = fBeam->sigma_dE;
00546     b_epsn_rms[i] = fBeam->epsn_rms_l;
00547 
00548     if (fGaussian)
00549         b_bl_gauss[i] = fSlices->bl_gauss;
00550 
00551     if (fPL != NULL) {
00552         b_PL_omegaRF[i] = fRfP->omega_RF[0][fITurn];
00553         b_PL_phiRF[i] = fRfP->phi_RF[0][fITurn];
00554         b_PL_bunch_phase[i] = fPL->phi_beam;
00555         b_PL_phase_corr[i] = fPL->dphi;
00556         b_PL_omegaRF_corr[i] = fPL->domega_RF;
00557         b_SL_dphiRF[i] = fRfP->dphi_RF[0];
00558         b_RL_drho[i] = fPL->drho;
00559     }
00560 
00561     if (fNoiseFB != NULL) {
00562         b_LHCnoiseFB_factor[i] = fNoiseFB->fX;
00563         b_LHCnoiseFB_bl[i] = fNoiseFB->fBlMeas;
00564         if (!fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB.empty())
00565             b_LHCnoiseFB_bl_bbb[i] = fNoiseFB->fBlMeasBBB;
00566     }
00567 }
00568 
00569 void BunchMonitor::close()
00570 {
00571     fH5Group->close();
00572     fH5File->close();
00573 }
